data.name: 投资时代打工人Demo
data.detailed_description: This is a simulation of life games, college entrance examination, part-time jobs, make friends, try to invest in projects, get financial freedom, the goal is to set up their own investment company. In the game, you will encounter mother's urging marriage, blind date with many beautiful women, father's many requirements for you, friends give you a lot of help, what you have to do is to constantly change better and become an excellent person. There are many intelligence games and action games in the game, which are interspersed with the plot of the game. Hope to bring joy and thinking to players.
data.about_the_game: This is a simulation of life games, college entrance examination, part-time jobs, make friends, try to invest in projects, get financial freedom, the goal is to set up their own investment company. In the game, you will encounter mother's urging marriage, blind date with many beautiful women, father's many requirements for you, friends give you a lot of help, what you have to do is to constantly change better and become an excellent person. There are many intelligence games and action games in the game, which are interspersed with the plot of the game. Hope to bring joy and thinking to players.

In the game, you will encounter mother's urging marriage, blind date with many beautiful women

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: XP, Vista,7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800MHz+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 High Color+
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

Recommended:
